results.title: About the museum – Estonian Museum of Architecture
results.content: Estonian Museum of Architecture . Open today 11–18. eng.The museum building itself is an exhibit – since 1996, the museum has been based in the Rotermann Salt Storage , built in 1908 and restored at the end of the century. It is one of the gems of industrial architecture in Tallinn.

results.title: Rotermann Salt Storage salt mill – Estonian Museum of Architecture
results.content: Estonian Museum of Architecture . Open today 11–18. eng.The vaults in the Rotermann Salt Storage cellar can still taste salty ! 140 g.

# [Shop](https://www.arhitektuurimuuseum.ee/eng/pood/)

![Rotermann Salt Storage salt mill](https://www.arhitektuurimuuseum.ee/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/2.jpg)

## Rotermann Salt Storage salt mill

5 €

## Description

Rotermann Salt Storage salt mill, with rock salt from Sweden (Paulig). The vaults in the Rotermann Salt Storage cellar can still taste salty!

140 g.

Keep in a cool and dry place.  
Best before 17.08.2024.

![](https://www.arhitektuurimuuseum.ee/wp-content/themes/arhitektuurimuuseum/assets/images/arhitektuurimuuseum_photo.jpg)

results.title: Museum of Estonian Architecture booklet
results.content: Opening times . Shop.The Museum of Estonian Architecture , which is located in the monumental Rotermann Salt Storage building, is a centre for the collection, research, and acquainting of Estonian architecture .
